description: Table in which n-th row lists digits in periodic part of decimal expansion of 1/n.
comments: The length of row n is A007732(n). - T. D. Noe, May 14 2008The convention is that the earliest period is displayed. - T. D. Noe, May 14 2008
references: Conway and Guy, The Book of Numbers, p. 160
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=1..100, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to decimal expansion of 1/n
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
